mapper.update: update member set member_pw=#{member_pw}, member_zipcode=#{member_zipcode}, member_addr=#{member_addr}, member_detailedaddress=#{member_detailedaddress}, member_tel=#{member_tel}, member_pref=#{member_pref}, member_intro=#{member_intro} where member_email=#{member_email}
mapper.select: select member_email,member_pw,member_name,member_zipcode,member_addr, member_detailedaddress,member_tel,member_pref,member_intro from member order by member_email ASC
